channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Well Here We Are Again
item.description: Hi it’s been a long time :wave: How have you been ? I decided after a break to come back to blogging on my free time ! Here’s what you can expect on this blog Tutorials Security watch posts Mostly elements that I’ve learned or found interesting I hope that you’ll like this new format. I had run into issues with my previous provider, hopefully GitHub will be a bit more lenient :)
